Based on their interest in animation, I would recommend the following two movies from the provided list: 
1. "The Incredibles" (2004) - This animated superhero film follows the adventures of Bob and Jane Brattson, who are forced to become superheroes after Bob is caught stealing a superpower suit.
2. "Up" (2009) - This animated adventure film tells the story of an elderly man named Carl Fredricksen, who embarks on an epic journey to fulfill his lifelong dream of visiting Paradise Falls, which he believes exists in South America.
Both "The Incredibles" and "Up" are highly-rated animated films that are sure to entertain audiences of all ages.

Thank you for your interests in animation movies. Here are two highly-rated options from that list:

1. "Soul" (2020) - Directed by Boaz Cohen, this animated musical film follows a young musician named Joe (voiced by Adam Scott) who dreams of becoming a professional musician.

The movie not only features an engaging story and memorable characters but also showcases exceptional animation, music, and voice acting performances.

1. "Aladdin" (1992) - Directed by Aladdin Disney Animation Studios, this animated musical film is based on the classic Disney animated feature film.

The movie follows the adventures of a young boy named Aladdin (voiced by Robin Williams) who lives in a small village called Medina (voiced by Roscoe Lee Jackson)).

After finding an ancient lamp containing magic and wishing for riches, Aladdin uses his magical powers to rescue Princess Jasmine from her captor, Jafar (voiced by Idris Elba))).

However, Aladdin's good intentions cause much trouble. With the help of his loyal friend and fellow villager, Alibaba (voiced by Alan Tudyk))), Aladdin and Jasmine embark on a series of exciting adventures, including traveling to distant lands, defeating powerful enemies, and encountering fascinating creatures.

Throughout their journey, Aladdin and Jasmine must also confront their own fears and weaknesses. With the help of their loyal friends and fellow villagers, Alibaba (voiced by Alan Tudyk))), Aladdin and Jasmine learn valuable lessons about friendship, courage, perseverance, and self-discovery.

In conclusion, both "Soul" (2020) directed by Boaz Cohen Disney Animation Studios) and "Aladdin" (1992) directed by Aladdin Disney Animation Studios) are highly-rated animated musical films that showcase exceptional animation, music, and voice acting performances.
